response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "medium", "He is an 18-year-old male."),
    ("gender", "low", "He identifies himself as White."),
    ("criminal_history", "high", "He has been arrested 2 times but has not been convicted."),
    ("height", "medium", "He is 5 feet 8 inches."),
    ("weight", "medium", "He weighs between 150 and 174 lbs."),
    ("marital_status", "low", "He is currently living alone."),
    ("education", "low", "He is enrolled in school at the present moment."),
    ("employment_history", "medium", "He has held 1 job during the year."),
    ("drug_use", "high", "He has used drugs (marijuana and cocaine) in the past four years."),
    ("depression", "low", "He does not feel depressed over the past month."),
    ("early_life_experiences", "medium", "He lived with both of his biological parents in an urban area at a young age."),
    ("spirituality", "low", "He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.")
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 90
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 2 times but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 8 inches and weighs between 150 and 174 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He is enrolled in school at the present moment. He has held 1 job during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 4, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
